cabbageMasala.name: Cabbage masala
method: Heat up 3 tsp oil, add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, garlic and cook garlic till it changes its color.
Add sliced onion and cook till it becomes soft.
Add turmeric powder, garam  masala, red chilli powder, coriander powder, mix and cook for 2 mts.
Add tomatoes, mix, cover and cook till tomatoes get soft.
Add sliced cabbage and mix. Add some peas for colour
Add salt to taste, cover and cook till cabbage gets tender
Add some chopped coriander (if you like)
